title: झूठा दावा: कांग्रेस के कई नेताओं ने एक ही बुज़ुर्ग महिला के साथ फोटो खिंचवाई
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: No media will show these heartwarming visuals from @surendranbjp campaign in Pathanamthitta. No newspapers will print these emotional pictures as photonews… It is the duty of all Hindus & Ayyappa Devotees to ensure the victory of K Surendran & other BJP-NDA candidates.Share max pic.twitter.com/3reH5oJTuz
